meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Myriophyllum, typically found in freshwater habitats.
meanings.sent1: The milfoil in the lake provides shelter for small fish.
meanings.sent2: The milfoil swayed gently in the current of the stream.
meanings.sent3: The ducks seemed to be having a meeting in the milfoil patch.
meanings.sent4: The milfoil stood tall like a forest in the underwater world.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the milfoil brightened the water's edge.

meanings.definition: Any of various aquatic plants resembling milfoil in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The pond was filled with different types of milfoil.
meanings.sent2: The milfoil look-alike added beauty to the pond's ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The frogs seemed to be playing hide and seek among the milfoil look-alikes.
meanings.sent4: The milfoil doppelgangers created a mesmerizing pattern in the water.
meanings.sent5: The delicate leaves of the milfoil imitators danced gracefully in the water.
